paudgalika anshayata yojitha wishrama watup kramaya magin danata sewakaya labana prathilabha kisiwak ahimi nowana bawa rajaya awadharanaya karayi.me kramayata sewakayaku dayaka wiya yuththe sewakayage dala watupen siyayata dekakinda, (2%) samagamen siyayata dekakda (2%) sewakaya wishrama yanawita labana parithoshithayen siyayata dahayakda (10%) sewaka artha sadhaka aramudalin siyayata dekakda (2%) sewa niyukthikayinge bharakara aramudale labhanshawalin siyayata dekakda (2%) labagena bawa kamkaru ha kamkaru sabandatha amathi gamini lokuge mahatha pawasiya.me aramudala aarambhayedi rajaya wisin rupiyal miliyana dahasaka mudalak labadena athara, eeta amatharawa warshika rupiyal miliyana 500 k laba demin mema aramudala shakthimath karana bawa amathiwaraya anawaranaya kaleya.danata wayasgatha kandaya wishala wana bawin idiri kalaye di mewani samaja aarakshana kramayak aarambha karana lesa wruththiya samithiwala illima anuwa meya karana bawada amathiwaraya kiweya.ebawin mehi thawama adupadu thibena bawin wruththiya samithi samanga sakachchawak sidukarana bawada lokuge mahatha sandahan kaleya.me watup kramaya magin sewakaya miya yamen pasuwa kalathrayata wishrama watupa himinowana bawath, sewakaya wishrama watup kramayata dayakawimedi wasara dahayata pera miya giyahoth ohu ithiri kala shreshayen siyayata 60 k labadena bawada amathiwaraya awadharanaya kaleya.wishrama yame awasan wayasa awurudu 60 kirima pilibandawa rajaya awadhanaya yomukara atha.ee anuwa sewakayek wishrama watup kramayata dayakawimen pasuwa wishrama yamedi parithoshithayen siyayata 90 kda, sewaka arthasadhaka aramudalin siyayata 98 kda, sewa niyuktha bharakara aramudala yana prathilabha himiwanu atha.emenma danata sitina shrama hamudawa thawa wasara dahayak pura sewawanwala niyuktha kara ganimin rate paladayithawaya nanwimada mehi aramunak wana athara inpasuwa anagathaye di me wishrama watupe thawa thawath sanshodhana athi kara ehi prathilabha sewaka janathawata labagatha haki yayi amathiwaraya penwa dunneya.mudal amathyanshaye ha bhandagaraye lekam aacharya pi. bi. jayasundara mahatha, me yojitha wishrama watup aramudala shakthimath kirima sandaha rajaya uparima shakthiya yoda thibena athara wishrama watup ahimi sewakayinta itha honda samaja aarakshana kramayak min athiwana bawa awadharanaya kaleya.me awasthawata shri lanka nidahas sewaka sangamaye pradhana lekam lesli dewendra mahatha adahas dakwamin ekwiya..

kisima awasthawakadi thama hamuwana lesata ethuma mata paniwuda ewa nomatha. 1960 - 1965 athara yugaye di ohu pawathna rajaye balagathu ha wadagath thanathuru daru namuth samanya minisaku wu mata ethuma wishala gaurawayak dakwiya.siyaluma awasthawaladi ethuma ma hamuwimata paminiye siya paudgalika uwamanawak sambandhayen nowa chanda dayakayakuge kisiyam prashnayak wisada ganimatayi. 1967 agosthu masaye di ewakata widyodaya wishwawidyalaya namin handinwuna wathman shri jayawardhanapura sarasawiye ganitha widya mahacharya ha anshadhipathidhurayata ma pathkaranu labiya.

sarasawiyaka ansha pradhaninge sita paudgalika samagamaka aarakshaka niladhariyeku dakwa kawara ho rakiyawaka yedena pudgalayekuta thamange rakiyawata adala simawan thula abhimathaya kriyathmaka kirimata rate deshapalana adhikariyen athi balapam wisin samanya pudgalayin awashya thanwaladi awashya thirana ganima adhairyaya karanu labimath, rate samanya pudgalayin awashya thanwaladi awashya thirana noganima hethuwen kohe ho siduwana sillara siduwimakata adala thiranayak ganimata widhayakaye pradhaniyata madihathwimata siduwimath ekinekin wiyuktha siduwim nowe.

– saddharmaya anthardhana wimata hethu – panychakho me kassapa okkamaniya dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antharadhanaya sanwaththanthi kathamepanycha “idha kassapa bhikkhubhikkhuniyo upasaka upasikayo saththari agarawa wiharanthi appathissa, dhamme agarawa wiharanthi appathissa, sanghe agarawa wiharanthi appathissa, sikkhaya agarawa wiharanthi appathissa, samadhismin agarawa wiharanthi appathissa, ime kho kassapa panychaokkamaniya dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antharadhanaya sanwaththanthi (sanyuktha nikaya – kassapa sanyuththakaya) bhuthapubban bhikkhawe dasabhathikanan aanakonama mudingo ahosi thassa dasabhathika aanake elithe anynyan aanin odahinsu, ahu kho so bhikkhawe samayoyan aana kassa mudingassa poranan pokkharan palakan antharadhayi, aani sanghatowa awasissi, ewa mewa kho bhikkhawe bhawissanthi bhikkhu anagatha maddhanan yethe suththantha thathagathabhasitha gambhira gambhiraththa lokuntharasunynyathapatisanyuththa thesu bhanynyamanesu na sussusanthi, na anynyachiththan upattapessanthi nachathedhamme uggahethabban pariyapunithabban manynyissanthi.
